channel.title: Tags on vknabel
channel.description: Recent content in Tags on vknabel

item.title: Announcement
item.description: New releases, new projects and abandoned ones.

item.title: Web
item.description: All about JS, TS, HTML, CSS and other web related topics.

item.title: Lithia
item.description:
Discontinued experimental programming language, functional with an implicit but strong and dynamic type system.

Has been discontinued. Source code is available code.knabel.dev/lithia-lang/lithia.

item.title: Tooling
item.description: All kinds of tooling like editors, frameworks, command line interfaces, language servers and more.

item.title: Zirric
item.description:
Early development, experimental programming language with an implicit but strong and dynamic type system.

Development is in an on-off phase. Docs can be found at zirric.knabel.dev, the source code is available at code.knabel.dev/zirric-lang/zirric. A development name for Zirric was Blush, which might still be used in some places.

item.title: Go
item.description: About Code written in Go. My open source Go projects are available at code.knabel.dev/go-lang.

item.title: Plants
item.description: Care and propoagation guides for plants. I tried to keep these simple and useful as possible. All photos are mine. Back in time I had a separate site called Aroid Garden. But I sunsetted it. You can see the old website on archive.org. Sadly I lost my original backup.

item.title: Puffery
item.description:
A push notification app for iOS. Discontued.

Source code is available on code.knabel.dev/puffery-app.

item.title: Swift
item.description: About Code written in Swift. My open source Swift projects are available at code.knabel.dev/swift-lang.
